text: Didier Lockwood (11 February 1956 â€“ 18 February 2018) was a French rock violinist. He played in the progressive rock/jazz rock band Magma in the 1970s. He was known for his use of electric amplification and experimentation on different sounds on the electric violin. He was born in Calais, France. Lockwood died on 18 February 2018 in Paris of a heart attack at the age of 62. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * * Category:1956 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:French jazz musicians Category:Rock musicians Category:French violinists
title: Didier Lockwood
